by Rula AlNasrawiDiversity Editor

In through your nose out through your mouth PERIOD

The Art of Living is a nonprofit worldrenowned program designed to eliminate anxiety from everyday life through the simple act of inhaling and exhaling PERIOD

Inspired by the teachings of spiritual leader Sri Sri Ravi Shankar the Art of Living seeks to promote stress reduction and peace of mind around the world PERIOD

Suresh Iyer UC Santa Cruz graduate student and local workshop organizer helped expand the foundation to Santa Cruz PERIOD

Its basically social transformation through individual transformation and to create a sense of belonging among people Iyer said PERIOD

Iyer explained that over  million people worldwide have used this program in  different countries PERIOD Since being founded in  the Art of Living has been run completely by volunteers PERIOD

It is the ancient wisdom of staying in the present and accepting people as they are Iyer said PERIOD Its about taking care of yourself. the fundamental core of this program lies within the practice of the Surdarshan Kriya the healing breath PERIOD The Kriyas main intent is to create a natural rhythm within the body and help bring the mind into focus PERIOD

Graduate student Rosie Wacha took the fiveday workshop in the spring of  and has not looked back since PERIOD The Kriya has become a permanent fixture in her life PERIOD

When I do the Kriya its a sort of meditation and I can go through my day without much distraction Wacha said PERIOD Its definitely made an impact. iyer who organizes Kriya courses at UCSC explained the importance of the breath PERIOD

There is a rhythm within the breath and finding that rhythm helps deal with emotions Iyer said PERIOD Everything in the world has got a rhythm. secondyear Nathan Taylor an Art of Living veteran found the Kriya practices beneficial in everyday life PERIOD

It helps you actually rest Taylor said PERIOD You do it and it just brings you through it PERIOD You really dont have to try anything  it just happens. iyer began coordinating the workshops almost two years ago and launched the first workshop in November  PERIOD Iyer discovered the Art of Living in  when he attended his first workshop PERIOD

Each workshop at  is normally split into  hours over a course of five days leaving participants with a flexible yet intensive week PERIOD

Its about living in the present Wacha said PERIOD Just think about whats going on right now. the Art of Living Foundation has begun extensive research on mind and body techniques PERIOD Scientists have been studying the impact and longterm benefits of Kriya Yoga although benefits have yet to be proven PERIOD

The Kriya takes some time out of my day but I really enjoy doing it Wacha said PERIOD It helps relax me. the classes require participants to continue to use the Kriya in their everyday lives PERIOD Daily Kriyas and weekly group Kriyas help bring the community together while still giving each individual the opportunity to find themselves PERIOD

After three successful runs between  and  UCSC students have already taken the workshop PERIOD

Its a way of giving back Iyer said PERIOD Its part of the service. the next Santa Cruz Art of Living Workshop will take place in February  PERIOD For more information about the Art of Living Foundation visit artofliving.org PERIOD
